column1: Chillupar is a constituency of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly covering the city of Chillupar in the Gorakhpur district of Uttar Pradesh
Chillupar is one of five assembly constituencies in the Bansgaon (Lok Sabha constituency). Since 2008
column2: this assembly constituency is numbered 328 amongst 403 constituencies.

column1: Currently this seat belongs to Bahujan Samaj Party candidate Vinay Shankar Tiwari
column2: who won in last Assembly election of 2017 Uttar Pradesh Legislative Elections by defeating Bharatiya Janta Party candidate Rajesh Tripathi by a margin of 3
